ComicInfo.Title: A Revolution in Oz. Chapter Six: The Lollipop Killed; Wooden Toys, Chapter 6 of Cubs in Toyland
ComicInfo.AlternateSeries: A Revolution in Oz, Cubs in Toyland
ComicInfo.Summary: Can the Fisher King save Therese or will young Dare be the heroic rescuing knight of his daydreams? In the penultimate chapter of "Cubs in Toyland," we will see just who will make it out of Discardia in one piece - and who will be tattered like the citizen toys. Also, the antics of Bufkin continue in the Oz backup feature with art by Shawn McManus!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 03:52:57. [CVDB346326] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:30:46. [Issue ID 968100]
